{{Han etyl}}
Unknown, probably a {{Han compound|丙|攴|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s|nocap=yes}} according to ''{{w|Shuowen}}''.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[change]]; to [[replace]]
# to [[take]] [[turn]]s; to [[rotate]]
# to [[experience]]
# 28th [[tetragram]] of the [[Taixuanjing]]; "change" ([[𝌡]])
